text: Our only plunder was the livestock and the spoils of the captured cities.
I will choose a faithful priest who shall do what I have in heart and mind. I will establish a lasting house for him and he shall serve in the presence of my anointed forever.
The king appointed Benaiah, son of Jehoiada, over the army in his place; Zadok the priest the king put in place of Abiathar.
Sheshan gave his daughter in marriage to his slave Jarha, and she bore him Attai.
descendants of Senaah, three thousand six hundred and thirty.
Then the enemy attacked them at once.
Nonetheless you say, “I am innocent; at least, his anger is turned away from me.” Listen! I will judge you on that word of yours, “I have not sinned.”
And I will establish for them an eternal covenant: I will be their God, and they shall be my people; and I will never again remove my people Israel from the land I gave them.’

The iron, clay, bronze, silver, and gold all crumbled at once, fine as the chaff on the threshing floor in summer, and the wind blew them away without leaving a trace. But the stone that struck the statue became a great mountain and filled the whole earth.
(and you yourself a sword will pierce) so that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.”
until I make your enemies your footstool.”’
